Text.text: GER01: Individual Reset Function for each Icon Tab
GER02: Change Background of selected Factor into light blue
GER03: Change from Edit Mode to Read-Only and vice versa
GER04: Download PDF to see content of all Icon Tabs
GER05: Change ScrollContainer - Just the content of Table is scrollable
GER06: Change SegmentedButton of Importance to a smaller Version
GER01.01: Open savedProjectsModel instead of factorCatalog - also updates Recommendation
GER01.02: Reload SegmentedButton - changes on medium directly
